name: Keshav Arri
summary: Full Stack AI/ML Engineer specializing in LLM orchestration, production machine learning pipelines, and scalable deployment. Delivered 77% latency improvements & 40% cost optimization driving business impact. Expertise in backend systems, cloud, & AI Agents—solving complex business challenges through effective collaboration & translating requirements into production-ready solutions delivering measurable ROI.

education.degree: Master of Applied Computing – Specialization in Artificial Intelligence
education.notes: Final semester requires 4 or 8 months internship starting Jan 2026

experience.title: AI ML Engineer
responsibilities: Engineered scalable production environment multimodal LLM pipeline using LangGraph, LangChain, OpenAI, Anthropic and APIs across Azure and AWS, achieving time reduction from 3+ minutes to 40 seconds

Led team building AI Agent curation engine with step-by-step reasoning and web search, implementing multi-threading architecture scaling 10x traffic while reducing API costs 40% using Jira for collaboration

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
responsibilities: Deployed machine learning models using XGBoost, Scikit-Learn, and PyTorch on large datasets from data lakes, achieving 15% accuracy improvement through rigorous analysis and problem-solving

Contributed to research project utilizing transformer architecture achieving 94% accuracy digitizing 10,000+ documents, demonstrating strong teamwork, verbal communication skills, & effective prioritization

project.name: Data Dialect AI
project.description: Architected AI Agent integrating SQL/NoSQL/Vector databases using LangGraph, Few-Shot learning, RAG, achieving 94% accuracy enabling non-technical users to query databases saving 15+ hours weekly
achievements: Built intelligent chatbot with FastAPI APIs and React, reducing query time by 65% through self-learning LLM pipeline with fine-tuned LLM, caching, & conversation history
Achieved 94% accuracy in database querying for non-technical users

project.name: EduMetrics
project.description: Developed full-stack platform using React, TypeScript, and Java Spring Boot with APIs and implementing advanced data structures & algorithms for real-time recommendations through scalable software engineering
achievements: Engineered web scraping pipeline using Selenium in Visual Studio, extracting insights from 5+ platforms
Reduced manual work 80% through automated data processing
WinHacks 2025 – Presented solution to 200+ professionals, demonstrating communication, leadership, and code reviews while explaining LLM implementations to stakeholders through effective reporting
Edge Hackathon 2024 - Collaborated in 48-hour sprint building scalable application, testing, debugging, monitoring, demonstrating teamwork, problem-solving, and delivering solution with documentation
